summary: Adds 20+ transformation spells to the game. Highly configurable.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1252.photobucket.com/albums/hh565/FinalGroove/description_zps860a6b42.png?t=1405264731[/img]
[line]
Do you have too many followers but you need a (second) horse? Then use a polymorph spell to transform one of your followers into a horse. If you prefer simple inventory management then why not transform your follower (or anyone, if you need some stuff) into a chest for a moment and conveniently manage his inventory?
Do you need an anvil or an alchemy table or simply a chair? Be evil and transform someone into it.
All of this is possible with this mod and even much more as you can configure every spell so that it suits your needs.
Be an evil magician, kill your enemies with style or randomly transform anyone that annoys you. The choice is yours.

[img]http://i1252.photobucket.com/albums/hh565/FinalGroove/features_zps2531d9a1.png?t=1405270192[/img]
[line]

This mod adds 20+ new spells to the game. It also comes with a small background story in form of a book which can be found in the tower south of Rorikstead. The spells themselves are also found in the tower in a chest called "Polymorph Spells". You can't miss it, as it is the only chest in the tower.

List of spells:
[list][*]Polymorph Hare
[*]Polymorph Dog
[*]Polymorph Deer
[*]Polymorph Chicken
[*]Polymorph Mudcrab
[*]Polymorph Horse
[*]Polymorph Goat
[*]Polymorph Mannequin (Work in Progress)
[*]Polymorph Chest
[*]Polymorph Fox
[*]Polymorph Sword
[*]Polymorph Sweet roll *
[*]Polymorph Furniture *
[*]Polymorph Shrink
[*]Polymorph Frostbite Spider
[*]Polymorph Hare Master (basically the same as Polymorph Hare but works within a 50m radius - overpowered)
[*]Polymorph Bedroll[/list]

* If you have transformed someone into an animal and unchecked "Only transform humans" in the config menu, you are able to transform your target again and again into something else. When you hit it with something other than a polymorph spell, he/she/it will transform back to normal. Sadly, due to limitations of the game engine this "again and again" part does not work for the spells marked with a " * ".

There are in fact four more spells, but they are WIP at the moment. So use "Polymorph Choose", "Polymorph Cast", "Polymorph Select Race" and "Polymorph Set Race" at your own risk.

[img]http://i1252.photobucket.com/albums/hh565/FinalGroove/installationv2_zpsda07c4bd.png[/img]
[line]
WIth Nexus Mod Manager [NMM]
1. Download SKSE (1.7 or higher) if you haven't already
2. Download SkyUI [color=green]OPTIONAL, but features will be very limited without a config menu![/color]
3. Follow the instructions provided by the authors of SKSE and SkyUI to install both mods
4. Download this mod's file
5. Activate the mod
6. Play the game (duh)

Without Nexus Mod Manager (mostly the same as with NMM):
1. Download SKSE (1.7 or higher) if you haven't already
2. Download SkyUI [color=green]OPTIONAL, but features will be very limited without a config menu![/color]
3. Follow the instructions provided by the authors of SKSE and SkyUI to install both mods
4. Download this mod's file
5. Open the downloaded archive
6. Drag and drop the contained files into your Data folder
7. Start the Skyrim Launcher and activate EnhancedPolymorphismMagic.esp in "Data Files"
8. Play the game (duh)

If you do not know where your Data folder is, I recommend watching some tutorials first. For example: This (You only need to watch the first five minutes)

If you have got any question, either write me a message, ask them in the forums tab of this mod or write them in the comment section. I will answer them ASAP.

This mod was approved by Sheogorath!


[line]

In any case, ask me before you do something. I might permit you to use/alter/reupload/expand the mod but I may just as well not. So: always ask me and do not assume things. I am planning on uploading the source code as an optional download, but I will only do this when I consider my mod as "ready" (or I stop the development).
